title: All the Backlist! July 1, 2022
description:
This week, Trisha recommends two historical romances—emphasis on the “historical”—based in the United States.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a beat book.

Books Discussed
Indigo by Beverly Jenkins
Let It Shine by Alyssa Cole
